column1: Research that uses data from D-PLACE should cite both the original source(s) of the data and the paper by Kirby et al. in which D-PLACE was first presented (e.g., research using cultural data from the Binford Hunter-Gatherer dataset: "Binford (2001); Binford and Johnson (2006); Kirby et al. 2016)." The reference list should include the date data were accessed and URL for D-PLACE (https://d-place.org), in addition to the full references for Binford (2001), Binford and Johnson (2006), and Kirby et al. 2016.
